TopicTitle: Constellations (Stars) on the Skybox (Or possibly very distant stars)

Articles.Content: I was thinking, it'd be nice for Kerbals to have their own star constellations in KSP 2. One could be a sandwich constellation, another could be in the shape of a rocket engine, maybe one or two could be easter eggs like a constellation in the shape of the original 3 seater command pod.

Well, constellations are just imagination, and it's not like you'll be seeing lines connecting stars in tracking station. Doubt there would be any in official lore but you could come up with some when you look at the skybox. Which is probably going to look different in other star system.
